entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain with snow changing to flurries this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
